You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &tfr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Tfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D517.
  * `&tfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D531.
